glsa.title: Nagios: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Nagios, the worst of which could lead to privilege escalation.

background.p: Nagios is an open source host, service and network monitoring program.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Nagios. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker, who either is already Nagios’s system user or belongs to Nagios’s group, could potentially escalate privileges.
In addition, a remote attacker could read or write to arbitrary files by spoofing a crafted response from the Nagios RSS feed server.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
